aboutMe.interests: I grew up playing games, so I want my future to revolve around making, developing software products, and designing software systems
aboutMe.inspiration: Though my passion was born from the fun and thrill of playing games, my greatest inspiration for deciding my future has and always will be my father
aboutMe.bucket_list: One of the things I want to do at least once in my life is to visit Japan, but not because of its culture in particular; instead, it is because of the beauty of its landscapes. Similarly, I also want to travel to European tourist spots because of how captivated I am by their architecture. In addition, I want to also see the Norther Lights, also known as the Aurora Borealis, because I believe it is the closest thing to magic we can have in this world. Lastly, I want to conquer my thalassophobia, which is a fear of deep bodies of water. Although, I have yet to decide how to go about it in practice

projects.title: Student Attendance System
projects.description: Allows student logins to record their attendance and submit excuse letters if absent, and it shows a list of attendance records and lets admins read submitted excuse letters.

projects.title: Online Newspaper System
projects.description: Updated code inconsistencies and added new features such as file uploads.

projects.title: Fiverr Clone
projects.description: Updated code inconsistencies and added new features such as image uploads.

projects.title: Point of Sales System
projects.description: An order management system designed using async-await frontend scripts connected to a custom-made PHP API.

education.description: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
